meanings.sent1: She modifies her outfit by adding a colorful scarf.
meanings.sent2: He modifies his bike to make it faster.
meanings.sent3: The chef modifies the recipe by using fresh herbs.
meanings.sent4: Time modifies our memories, making them fade.
meanings.sent5: The artist modifies reality in his paintings, creating a new world.

meanings.definition: To limit or qualify the meaning of something
meanings.sent1: The new evidence modifies our understanding of the case.
meanings.sent2: The additional clause modifies the contract terms.
meanings.sent3: His joke modifies the seriousness of the situation.
meanings.sent4: Her smile modifies the harshness of her words.
meanings.sent5: The filter modifies the colors in the photograph, enhancing its beauty.
